comments:
Build: 3.0 M2
I got the exception pasted when I tried to save my file.  My previous attempt 
(two minutes earlier) to save that same file was successful.  A subsequent 
attemp to save the file also yielded the same exception.
When I rebuilt the project, everything was fine thereafter.
